2/ Stronghold is a critical piece of the #IOTA puzzle. We now have a highly-secure, easy-to-use library for developers to build applications on IOTA, portable across a variety of operating systems, devices and use cases.
This is huge!   More than 12 government grants and 100 partners paying IF to develop their respective projects.   Indeed 2021 will be a Cambrian explosion of everything #IOTA !!!

3/ You can think of #IOTA libraries as Lego blocks - you select different pieces, fit them together and build a use case. For example, for a decentralised data marketplace you might take Streams, Identity and Wallet. Now you can also add Stronghold and ensure your app is secure.
